title: Simulation-Based Workshop for Teacher Professional Development and Science Education Innovation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of science curricula and fundamental understanding of curriculum design
context.additional_context: Teacher competency enhancement program using smartphone-based VR simulations. Participants (pre-service teachers or students/job seekers interested in educational reform) develop professional expertise through collaborative instructional design experiences.

learning_goals: Executing a teacher-led collaborative design model for science education reform with over 90% engagement in VR simulation environments
Analyzing stakeholder interests (teachers/parents/policymakers) in educational communities and incorporating them into professional development strategies
Design project-based assessment tools suitable for 21st-century educational environments and achieve a suitability score of 80+ (out of 100) through peer review

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
